response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we believe its true worth is $15,000 to you. Considering this, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your endeavors or personal needs. We look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss how this product can add value to your life.", "product_price": 12000}
